artist: Thomas Rhett Featuring Reba McEntire, Hillary Scott, Chris Tomlin & Keith Urban

chunked_vad.lyrics_text: In a time full of war, be peace In a time full of doubt, just believe Yeah, there ain't that much difference between you and me In a time full of war, be peace
